inn1.comm: Starts off with a wide. That pitched outside off stump and moved further away.
Beaten this time outside off-stump. Broad is bowling a tight line on off-stump.
full outside off stump with a hint of swing away from the right-hander. Left alone
Defended on the leg side
pitched outside off stump and swings away from Hafeez who leave it alone
straighter line on leg stump. Hafeez tries to flick it on the leg side and gets hit on the pad
outside off stump and swinging away from Hafeez. Left alone again
pitches just outside off stump and swings away. Hafeez fends at it but is beaten by the movement.
drifts into Farhat's pads. Clipped to fine leg for two
slower ball on off stump. Lazy drive gets and inside edge on to the leg side
an edge falls short of Chris Read. That pitched on middle and off stump and moved across Farhat. He gets a faint edge but the ball bounces a yard in front of Read.
another edge. This time it's a thick one off the outside edge that flies wide off first slip and runs down to third man.
slower ball, played back to the bowler
another play and miss outside off stump. Broad is moving the ball both aways
Left alone outside off-stump
much closer to off-stump on this occasion. Farhat thinks about playing it but pulls out of it an th last minute.
Wide outside off stump. Left alone
strays down leg-side this time. Wide called.
defended on the off side
pitched on middle stump. Farhat tries to flick but gets hit on the pads
worked off the hips but straight to the fielder
pitched on off stump and moves a touch into Hafeez who gets beaten
strays well down leg side. Read fumbles the take and the batsmen run a bye
Left alone outside off stump
strays down leg side. Farhat tries to glance it down to fine leg. the ball clips the pad and runs down to the boundary for four leg byes.
played straight back to the bowler
the batsman tries to defend on the off side but an inside edge goes past square leg for one
Left alone outside off stump.
left alone outside off-stump.
dabbed on the leg side and the batsmen take off for a sharp single. there was nearly a mid-pitch collision between them but they swerve out of each other's way
defended on the leg side
a touch shorter in length and outside off stump. Hafeez tires to stand up and play it on the off side but misses.
full and on the pads. Hafeez leans across and sweetly clips it over midwicket for the first boundary of the bat.
full on the pads. Farhat tries to flick it but gets and inside edge on the leg side for a single
fuller in length and angling into Hafeez's leg stump. The batsman tries to force it on the leg side but is hit on the pad
shorter in length and outside off stump. Hafeez pounces on the width and cuts it past point for four
left alone outside off stump
closer to off stump and angling into Hafeez who judges it perfectly and lets it go through to Read
defended off the pads on the leg side
leg-stump line and Farhat tries to play it fine but misses. The ball clips the pad and was perilously close to leg stump as well
pitches on leg and middle stump. Played on the leg side for one
pitches on off stump and angles into Hafeez who gets a half stride in before getting struck on the pad. Lewis goes up in appeal but the ball struck him marginally outside off stump
left alone outside off stump.
shorter in length and a touch quicker as well. Hafeez goes on the back foot and gets hit on the pad
pitches on off stump and angles away. Left alone by the batsman
picthes on middle and off stump. Farhat gets forward and defends
beaten outside off stump. Fuller in llength and swinging away from the left-hander who fends tentatively at it
fuller in length but on middle and leg stump. Clipped straight to midwicket
Full on leg stump. Farhat tries to flick but is struck on the pads
another mis-hit. Full on the pads once again. Farhat aims for the flick through the leg side but gets an outside  edge to third man for one
wide outside off stump. Farhat flays at it but misses.
fuller and straighter that the last ball. Farhat goes back and tries to force it through the off side but gets beaten by the movement away from him
this time he decides against the waft outside off stump and leaves it alone
defended back to the bowler
full and swinging back into the left-hander who plays it back to Lewis
pitches outside leg stump and angles into Farhat who moves towards off stump and plays in on the leg side for one
driven hard past the bowler. There were cries of catch but it was a bit too far from Broad. Three runs taken to long off
beaten outside off stump
much wider outside off stump this time. Too wide and the umpire calls it.
full and on the pads. Hafeez lofts it over midwicket and finds the fence.
shorter in length and cuts back into Hafeez from outside off stump. Played down to fine leg for one
flicked off the pads to deep square leg for one
that pitches very wide outside off stump and moves further away. He seems to have lost his grip on that delivery. Wide called
left alone outside off stump
shorter in length and arhat dabs it on the o side and set o for a risky single. It would have been close had Pietersen hit the stumps
another sharp single taken. The openers are testing the England fielders
played to short fine leg
slower ball on middle stump. Hafeez flicks through midwicket but doesn't time it well
full on the pads. Farhat tries to force it on the leg side but gets and edge on the of side
drifts on to the pads and Hafeez turns it past square for one.
pitches just outside leg stump. Farhat moves across and attempts to play it on the leg side but gets hit on the pads.

Farhat tries to cut but gets an inside edge that trickles past the stumps. He sets o for a single but gets sent back by Hafeez. But before  he makes his ground Chris Read flicks the ball on to the stumps. The umpire takes his time calling for the third umpire but when he does replays show Farhat's bat to be on the line when the bail is dislodged.
short of a length and Afridi goes back and defends on the back foot
pitches on of stump and shapes away. Afridi gets squared up and is beaten
drifts way down leg side. Thats the eighth wide England have bowled today
defended on the off side
straight ball played back to the bowler
tucked away down leg side for one
shorter in length. Afridi gives it the charge, doesn't get to the pitch of the ball and clips it in the air but the ball falls agonisingly short of mid-on.
slapped straight to cover
turned off his hips for one
bowled! Read came up for that delivery to stop Afridi giving Lewis the charge. Afridi has a wild heave at one on off stump. He misses Lewis hits, Pakistan are two down
the ball climbs on Hafeez from short of a length. The batsman goes back and defends on the off side
short and outside off stump. Hafeez tries to pull but only manages to drag it back onto his stumps. Pakistan three down
Full on off stump, driven on the up straight to mid-off.
defended on the leg side
off-stump line. Younis gets forward and is hit on the pad. Loud appeal but it was too high
played on the off side for one
left alone outside off stump. that pitched wide outside off stump and moved a touch away.
angling into middle and leg stump from short of a length. Younis goes back to pay it but is hit high on the pad.
defended on the off side
pitches outside off stump and angles away. Beaten outside off stump
short on middle and leg, some bounce but well negiotiated through square leg
a bouncer on middle and off, looks to hook but gets hit on top of the helmet
good length ball on off stump, played out towards point
off stump line, pushed to covers
left alone outside off stump
steered to third man for one
off-stump line. Yousuf gets forward and is hit on the pad outside the line of off stump
hit on the pads again outside the line of off stump. Muted appeal for leg before
middle and leg stump line. Turned on the leg side for one
fuller on off stump. Played to point off the front foot
what a shot! Banged in short, Yousuf swivels on one leg and hooks that high, high with the top-edge that sails right over Michael Yardy's head down at deep backward square leg for six
played into the covers
middle and leg, worked well past midwicket and some good running gets them three there
good length on middle and off, some movement there and it jags into him, struck high on the pads, appeal but not out says the umpire
short and wide but he can only cut that to point on the bounce
good length ball on off, a tad slower, and Younis makes room and defends awkwardly off the back foot
quick ball on middle and leg, shapes to flick it but gets an outside edge that flies towards cover, lucky lucky
beauty of a ball that lands on off and shapes past his bat, that was close!
slower and fuller outside off, driven with a flourish but right to mid-off
middle and off line, pushes that into mid-off and calls for the run, Younis responds well and they get it, good running
thats close again, Younis makes room to cut one but mistimes it and the ball almost drags onto his offstump, that was too close for comfort
and that'll be wide, son! Broad just striving for too much, lands that one too far outside the offstump, Read moves to his right and takes it
width offered and its cut exaggeratedly in the air past gully and down to third man for one, Younis retains strike
slower ball on middle and off, whipped past midwicket with ease
good length ball on off, Yousuf drives off the backfoot but gets an inside edge onto the pads

and he gets his man! Good length ball on and around off stump, Yousuf is cramped for room and he drives tamely, was taken by surprise by the rise on that one, ball takes the outer edge and flies low to the lone slip, Strauss, who dives to his left and takes a sweet catch, well held and thats a big wicket for England, Yousuf signs off his successful England tour with a low score
short of a good length on middle and leg, turned to the onside but doesnt want the run
slower and fuller on off, typical assured cover drive from Inzy into the covers
what a good one to begin with, a hint of something, some bounce as Younis looks to drive but gets beaten between bat and pad
similar ball, Younis leaves it as Read fumbles the take
lands outside offstump and shapes away for Younis to leave it alone
slow half volley outside offstump, driven to mid-off, late into the shot was Younis
slow on middle and off, driven awkwardly towards mid-on, thought of the run but Yousuf says no
a fraction down the pads and its called wide
ohh, full on off stump and its smacked back towards his left, Collingwood dives high but can only get a finger on it and deflects the ball down to mid-off, that was hit hard, but a chance gone down
middle stump, worked past square leg for one, Inzamam off the mark
slower on off, driven back to the bowler
banged in short halfway down  the track, Younis ducks and Read takes it low in front of him
good length ball outside off, played with soft hands between slip and gully
banged in short, Inzamam has plenty of time to swivel and pull that high over midwicket, one bounce into the man in the deep

and Collingwood gets a wicket in his 100th ODI! He strikes with onethat lands on middle and off and moves in a fair bit to rap Inzamam on the pads, looks in front, could be high but umpire Harper says that's out, Inzamam looked to have been pretty much plumb in front of the stumps and he has to go
good ball, stump-to-stump stuff this, Razzaq hops in his crease and keeps it down
pitches around offstump and its left alone, Read again fumbles a simple take...tsk, tsk
this one is wider outside off as Razzaq shoulder arms, umpire calls it wide now
good movement from this one as it lands outside, Razzaq leaves it again
once more, outside off and he shoulders arms, Read manages to take this one
slower ball, almost a yorker, he defends and gets an inside edge onto the pads, fine over that from Collingwood, wicket No. 49 for him
middle and leg line, moves across and flicks it down to backward square leg
a lifter on and around offstump, Razzaq stands tall and draws the bat out of the way
good ball on off and moving away, Razzaq gets a stride into it and leaves it
good ball on off, moves away, Razzaq half-pokes at it and misses completely
yorker on middle and off, well dug out to the onside
another yorker-length delivery swings into him, he defends but gets an inside edge as bowler and 'keeper go up in appeal, umpire not even interested
slower on off, driven into the covers
slower, almost a low fulltoss on off, driven lazily into the covers
this one lands somewhere outside off, close to a wide but Harper gives no response to that one
quicker halfvolley on middle and leg, whipped off the pads to deep backward square leg
width offered and he drives with a flourish, gets the edge past a diving slip who cant get to it and he gets a run down to third man, some swing here by Collingwood
good length on and around off stump, Razzaq shoulders arms to that one
good ball on offstump, Younis drives and gets an outer edge past gully
leaden-footed flash and a miss from Razzaq to one outside offstump
a slow half-tracker on leg stump has Razzaq ducking down on his haunches
and another similar ball has Razzaq getting out of the way again
fuller outside off stump, pushed to point
full outside off, left alone with a big stride forward
middle and leg line, worked to square leg
middle and off and moving into him, he tries to lap it around the corner and gets the glove on it, runs away for two but its given as off the bat, risky shot that
close, very close, looks to work it around the corner again with that paddle shot, rapped outside the line and he gets a legbye around the corner, that pitched outside the line of off, however
middle and leg, worked through midwicket
same ball, this time he makes room and back-foots it to the onside
a rank half-tracker, Younis sees it and goes for a pull but almost falls over in his shot, does get bat on it and it runs away to fine leg for four, welcome boundary
full on off, defended with a straight bat
middle and off, defended again
quicker on middle and off, patted back to the bowler, decent over of left-arm spin
off stump line, driven into the covers
full outside off and its driven past point
width outside offstump but its left alone for Read

Wicket No.50 for him! Good-length ball on off stump, Razzaq plays all over it and the looks back in horror as it nips in and disturbs the furniture, the bowler raises his arms in triumph and gets the hugs from his team-mates, while the batsman hangs his head, tucks his bat under his arm, and begins the long walk back, England make further inroads
middle and leg, worked past midwicket for a single
short of a good length on off, played down to point
full on off, driven between cover and mid-off for a couple, sweeper collects it
short and cut to point for a single
tossed up on middle and off, defended
flighted on middle and leg, a full toss, but he can only put it away for one to mid-on
flighted on offstump, Younis forward in defense
half-volley on middle and off, pushed back past the bowler but mid-on stops it
shot, sir, offstump ball and he gets across and paddle-sweeps that around the corner, a couple bounces into the ropes
good ball on off stump, Younis defends with a dead bat this time
ohhh, pitches on off stump, drops his hands and the ball just misses the stumps again
slower ball outside off, driven into the covers
flighted, a full toss really, and its driven to covers
short but he mistimes the cut to gully
tossed up on off, looks to sweep it again but mistimes it, ball rolls to the offside
width offered again this time and he makes room and carves that past point

fine, fine catch from Read! Amazing! 60mph on that left-arm tweaker, lands on and around offstump, some room there, he makes room to cut and does so very hard, but the ball gets the top-edge and Read takes a smart catch, into the gloves, pops out and onto the arm and he takes in on the rebound, that was a reflex catch and Yardy gets a wicket, Pakistan slip further
width offered, cuts poorly into the covers
middle and leg line, worked off the pads past midwicket
strives for the yorker but more of a half-volley, slow ball, well driven into the covers
similar ball but more middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler
slow drifter outside off, well struck into the covers
a little quicker this time, outside off again, he drives and gets a thick edge past a diving slip
tossed up outside off, driven past point for a couple, well run
shorter on middle and leg, easy single into the onside
dropped in too short, Younis swivels and pulls over midwicket and one bounce into the sweeper
offstump, defended towards point
the drifter, well bowled, lands on off and spins past his bat
offstump line, well defended
Driven to mid-off
full on the pads. Younis goes down on one knee and sweeps powerfully for four to deep square leg
played to fine leg for one
pitches on off stump and cuts in a bit. Left alone but that was so close to off stump
defended on the leg side
Slower ball and a yorker to boot. Naved-ul-Hasan keeps it out
fired into middle and leg. Younis goes back and gets an edge that rolls on the off side
defended back down the pitch
played to short fine leg for one
fired in full and fast. Defended on the front foot
driven to mid-on
turned down to short fine leg
dabbed on the leg side for a sharp single
slower through the air and wide outside off stump. Cut past point for one
shorter in length and drifting on to leg stump. Younis gets across and plays it wide of the short fine leg fielder for one
driven straight to cover
turns sharply into the right hander from outside off stump. The balls hits the pad and baloons up. Read runs around to collect it
a touch short of a length and angling into  Younis who swings it away to deep midwicket for one
pitches outside off stump and holds its line. Naved-ul-Hasan lets it go
short of a length and on off stump. Naved-ul-Hasan goes back and defends to cover
on off stump and angling into the batsman. Naved-ul-Hasan gets half forward, opens the face of the bat and guides it past the diving first slip for one.
steered down to third man for one
full on off stump. Naved-ul-Hasan drives through cover for one and keeps strike.
off stump line but Naved-ul-Hasan still tries to get across and sweep but doesnt make contact.
defended on the off side
beaten outside the off stump
fired down leg side . Wide called
played on! Full outside off stump. Naved-ul-Hasan first thinks about driving it and then tries to cut. The ball turns sharply and takes the bottom edge of the bat on to the stumps
pitches on off stump and turns towards leg. Defended on the leg side
defended on the off side on the front foot. Rao survives.
Wide outside off stump and Younis caresses it past point to the fence for four
defended on the off side
played back to the bowler on the back foot
full and straight. Rao Iftikhar defends on the off side
short of a length and on middle stump. Defended easily by the batsman.
driven past mid-off for one
full on off stump. It was too full for any turn and Rao Iftikhar squeezes it out to cover
driven straight to mid-off
played back to the bowler
defended on the front foot
tossed up outside off stump. Played on the front foot to short third man. Just the single from the over.
worked off the pads to midwicket for a quick double
fired in on off stump. Defended on the front foot to the off side
tight line on off stump. No room whatsoever. Defended on the off side
played back to the bowler
swept to deep backward square leg for one
defended back to the bowler. Another over gone and Pakistan are crawling along
tossed up on off and middle. Younis waited for it and drove it down the ground for one
full and on off stump. Lobbed back but the ball falls short of the bolwer
full toss on off stump. Played unconvincingly through cover for one

and that's the huge wicket England wanted. That ball was fired down legside. Younis attempts the reverse sweep but top-edges straight to Ed Joyce at short third man. Joyce hardly had to move to take that catch
defended on the leg side
driven down the ground for one
defended on the leg side
played on the off side on the front foot
defended with an angled bad towards point
played back to the bowler
dabbed on the leg side for one run
defended to short third man
defended on the off side
full and angling into the pads.
tossed up. Driven to mid-off who is in the circle to prevent the single
gets a big stride in and defends on the off side
slips down leg side and Read collects well. Wide called
driven down to long off for one
short outside off stump. Rao Iftikhar cuts but can't beat Collingwood at point
bouncer. There are two men out for the hook but the bastman tries it anyway but misses
short ball and this one doesn't bounce that high. Pulled away to deep square leg. Bell does well to save the boundary
another bouncer. Asif ducks under this one
defended on the back foot back to the bowler
Mahmood oversteps and the batsman pushes it out on the off side for one
full on the pads. Turned through square leg for one
tossed up but drifting down leg side. Turned to short fine leg. the batsmen thought about the single but decided against it
full toss driven down the ground for one
turns away from Asif after pitching outside off stump. The batsman is beaten
beaten again outside off stump
played on the off side for one
full on off stump. Driven to wide long-off for just one
full and straight. That was the attempted yorker but it wasn't quite there. Dug out on the off side
and again. Full and straight on middle and leg. Driven to cover on the front foot
Mahmood digs  it in short and the batsman ducks
played away on the leg side for one
a touch short of a length and on middle and leg stump. Asif goes back and defends
guided to third man for one.
Full and straight. Batsman has no option but to defend
full again but outside off stump. Driven to mid-off
full toss on leg stump. Fine leg was in the circle and Rao Iftikhar flicks it wide of him for four
full on off stump. Dug out but straight to cover
short of a length and Asif backs away, swings at it but fails to connect.

inn2.comm: and England are away with a no-ball
pitched well outside off, left alone
and again, outside off and watched through to the 'keeper
shot to get off the mark, loose delivery outside off, he gets to the pitch of it and frees the arms, hit on the rise and throught cover and mid-off for four
thats quite wide outside the off stump, Strauss leaves it alone
middle and leg line this time, Strauss has time to tickle it off the pads and get to the other side
slower half-volley on the stumps and its driven back down the ground, ricochets into the nonstriker's stumps
outside off stump to begin with and Strauss leaves it for Kamran Akmal
too far outside the stumps, poor cricket, wide called
angling across him and he leaves it alone
this one's outside offstump again and its ignored once more by Strauss
this drifts onto the pads but Strauss can only drive to midwicket
short of a length and he just stands tall and drives off the backfoot through covers for four, top shot
better! This is begging to be hit and he obliges with a smashing back-foot cut through point, Rana all over the place today, Strauss looking confident
and he's off the mark as well as this one is full on leg and is easily whipped past square leg to the ropes, good shot
shorter around offstump and moving away, Joyce raises the arms and allows it past
good ball, from close to the stumps and it lands on off and moves away, left alone
shot again, full on the middle stump and Joyce moves down the track and makes it a half-volley, just uses the pace to wristily steer that past square leg for four more

bye bye Joyce! This one lands on a sweet spot on off, Joyce thinks it is going to move away but it swings back into him and shatters the offstump! A poor leave from Joyce, judgment error, really but he's sent packing and Asif has drawn first blood
good ball to get first up, quick and fullish on off stump and Bell defends with a full face of the bat, ball trickles towards mid-on, good over from Asif ends
good ball, shapes away from off stump, the batsman leaves it
wider outside off, Strauss thought about cracking it past point but decides to leave it
this one shapes in from offstump, Strauss allows it through with care
bad ball, down the pads and its called wide
back to that outside-the-offstump line, Strauss leaves it again, thats the way Rao should be bowling
identical delivery again, some hint of movement away, left alone
and again, outside off and its left alone
half-volley on off, driven to mid-off
good length on off, uses the soft hands to keep it down past gully for a single to third man
that was close! A good ball on off, Strauss decides to leave it much as Joyce did, and the ball just misses kissing the top of offstump
this one goes the other way, Strauss pokes it and misses as Akmal takes it, fine bowling this
and he strays onto middle and leg and Strauss gets on top of it and flicks it through square leg for four, good comeback shot
again he drifts onto middle, the ball does nothing, and Strauss flicks it finer for a single to deep fine leg
very full on off stump and he greets it with a firm, free-flowing drive through deep cover for another boundary, good stroke
slightly wider this time, thinks about the stroke but leaves it alone
another half-volley on off, this time he doesnt time it as well, ball goes straight to cover
good-length delivery outside off, some swing away, shoulders arms this time
good ball again, same as the previous one, again Strauss watches it through
he serves up a no-ball, ball lands on off, Bell uses the soft hands to keep it down towards gully
dropped in somewhat short, and on this sluggish pitch Strauss rocks back and swivel-pulls that through square leg for four
good length ball on middle and leg, Strauss hops and tickles that around the corner and very fine and it beats a woeful attempt down at fine leg, four more runs
bowled from wide of the crease, pitches on a good length around offstump, defended to point
too close for comfort, beautiful ball on the stumps, shapes away and again Strauss leaves it alone but its harrowingly close to shaving the stumps
wide of the crease again, on the stumps and he defends to the offstump
this one lands on a good spot on off, Strauss defends and gets an edge past a diving second slip
full on off stump, mis-times the drive to mid-off
pitched up outside off and he goes over the top, frees the arms and smacks that over cover-point for four
off stump, not as full, left alone this time
good ball outside off, left alone
beaten on the defense by a ripper that moves in from outside off
some room there outside off but he cant get on top of it, ends up chopping it to point on the bounce
defends one on the stumps and almost pops it back to Asif, he was too early into his shot
goes for a pull shot, swing-and-a-miss there
on the stumps, defended back to the bowler

Got 'em! Outside the off stump, Bell is drawn into the drive but can only get a thick outside edge to gully where Imran Farhat takes a very good catch diving to his right, Bell is gone and Pakistan are making inroads

Game on indeed! This one lands outside off and is moving away, Strauss decides to flash at it and gets an edge, and Akmal dives full length to his left and takes a very fine catch to send him packing and Pakistan have hit back hard, England's captain goes
half-volley on middle, he drives but not to where he intended, gets an outer edge to point and steals a run, thats the 50 up for England
half-volley on off, pushed past the bowler but mid-off fields
good ball on off, he steps into it and squeezes that to backward point for a sharp single
lands on off and moves away, KP is beaten in his tame forward prod and Asif maintains his hold over this batsman all summer, words from the bowler and fielders back to KP
good length on and around off, leans into it and drives to point again, loud call of 'NO' from KP
fuller this time and he again leans into it with a firm drive, beats Shahid Afridi's dive at cover, but it was hit too hard on the up and speeds away for four, a sarcastic clap from Asif, classic!
middle and leg, worked to mid-on, one of just two fielders on the onside
looks to smash this one but leaves it alone at the last moment
walks down the pitch to one thats dropped in short, makes room and gets on top of it and plays it to square leg
full on middle stump, flicked hard but Afridi makes a fine stop at midwicket saves run
good ball on off, stands tall and manages to keep it down
similar ball on off, good pace too, pushed into the covers
shapes away from off, he goes to defend but misses, a good test of Collingwood's technique
slightly shorter outside off, he goes for a tame, leaden-footed cut but can only chop it to the offside, no chance of a run even
full on the stumps, he defends and the ball rolls towards midwicket
on the stumps, he gets right behind it and defends
beaten by the movement, ball lands on off, Collingwood stands there and drops the bat on it, manages an inside edge past his stumps to square leg
lands on a good length outside and is left alone with a high raise of the bat, Test-match style
KP moves in his crease as Asif bowls, he lands it on a good spot on off, defended towards point
again he's right on target and KP defends it back to Asif
swings into him from off, looks to defend and is hit above the knee roll, some bat on that
and again, he looks to defend this one on off but inside-edges onto the pads, he looks weary
a good ball on off, this time he gets behind it and defends back to the bowler

catch dropped! Full ball is driven airily back to the bowler, but those are hard in the follow-through, was not struck with any force but Rao went for it too early, didnt really get a hand to it and the ball goes towards mid-on
beaten outside the off stump, ball held its line well
full on middle and its defended to Asif at mid-on, maiden over there
good ball on middle and off, full, swinging away from him, KP tries to flick but gets a leading edge that flies past point for four, quick outfield but this batsman not looking well against Asif
full on middle and leg, driven to mid-on and he dives and stops it they get the run
bowled from around the wicket now, full on leg and he eases that past square leg for two, well run
very good shot! Pulled from outside offstump and in front of midwicket for a sumptious four, Asif tried too much and it looked like Collingwood was ready and waiting
he gives him the charge, works this from middle stump and past square leg for two more, almost fell over in that shot
full on the stumps, prodded back to Asif to end the second Powerplay
full on middle and leg, again he looks to flick it but gets another outside edge that flies past point for four more, not at all convincing that
on off, tight line this time and KP drives it to Rao's left and he takes it well, looks to have a shy at KP's end
middle stump line again, this time he times it well and swats that through midwicket for four, is he wanting to end it inside the Powerplays?
short of a good length on off, driven on the up through extra cover with one hand, he got well on top of that and drove with power, well played
and more runs! Full on off, he shimmies down the track and disdainfully takes it on the full, whipping it past Asif at mid-on for four more, explosive over
short of a length and angling into Collingwood who goes back and defends back to the bowler.
defended to midwicket of the back foot
full an drifting onto middle and leg. Tucked away through square leg for a comfortable double
pushed to cover
full on off stump. Driven to mid-off who dives but only manages to slow it down. The batsman run three as Mohammad Yousuf runs around to field the fumble.
short of a legnth outside off stump. Defended on the off side on the back foot.
left alone out side off stump.
pitches on off stumpa dn turns away. Pietersen prods at it and gets beaten.
played to mid-on for one
worked behind square for a single
driven straight to mid-on
comes down the track and tries to force it on the leg side. Pietersen misses it completely and is hit bang on the box. That had to hurt
driven to mid on
dabbed to mid-on on the front foot and the batsmen steal a single
slips down leg side and Collingwood misses the glance down leg side. Howvere, the ball hits the edge and Akmal fumbles the take on the bounce and the ball runs down for four
played back to the bowler
driven to mid-on
tossed up on off stump, played on the off isde
bowled! tossed up again. Pietersen gets into an awkward position but nevertheless tries to swipe it on the leg side. This time he misses and his off stump is pegged back.
played off the back foot to cover
defended on the front foot back to the bowler

Afridi has another one! That ball drifted ever so slightly in the air, had Dalrymple playing down the wrong line, pitched on middle and struck him low on the front pad. That was definitely taking off stump.
driven through cover
drifting on to middle and leg and Collingwood neatly plays it through midwicket for four. Immaculately timed that was.
defended on the back foot on the leg side
Pakistan are on a roll here. Pitches around off stump, nips back in and keeps a touch low. Collingwood plays back and is hit in front. The umpire has a good look and eventually rules him out.
Fast and outside off stump. Read has a poke and misses.
very wide outside off stump and Read chases it but his wild slash connects with air.
Defended on the leg side
full toss, played back to Afridi
outside off stump, the batsman opens the face and runs it down to third man for two.
tossed up outside off stump but the ball spins in and Akmal misses it as well. The batsmen take two byes
full outside off stump. Left alone
full outside off stump. The batsman misses it and so does Akmal. Four byes
wide outside off stump. Read slashes and misses
wide again outside off stump. Read slashes again and gets it over point for four
full and straight. Played back to the bowler
a rush of blood does Read in. Short ball and Read plays a very inappropriate hook. Rana Naved-ul-Hasan was out in the deep and judged the catch perfectly.
pitches on off stump and moves away. The batsman pulls out of the stroke
full on off stump. Driven to cover
picthes on off and middle and goes straight through. Mahmood pokes at it and gets an edge through square leg for two
defended on the front foot
full and drifting down leg side. Mahmood turns it behind square and times it well enough to reach the fence
left alone outside off stump. Mahmood got a stride in and watched it go past
driven towards mid-on but Afridi cuts it off
played towards cover
pitches on middle and leg and angles across Yardy. Defended on the off side.
pitches outside leg and carries on down leg side. Wide called
fuller and straighter this time. Yardy defends back to the bowler
shorter in length and Yardy stands up and plays it down on the off side
pitches outside off stump and moves away from Yardy who wants nothing to do with it. Akmal collects it.
wide outside off stump. Yardy guides it down to third man for one and keeps strike
drifts down legside. The umpire calls it wide but replays show the ball clipping the pad
wide outside off stump. This is the second wide of the over
full and angling into Mahmood who gets hit on the pad. Loud appeal for lbw is turned down.
slower ball, played to mid-on
width offered, well cut past a diving backward point and he wants the second run, they do well to get back
on the stumps, moves away and plays to point
on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
pitches on off stump and moves away from Yardy who fends at it and gets beaten
played with and angled bat past point for a single.
short outside off stump and Mahmood cuts and finds the gap between cover and point. The batsmen run two
on off stump. Defended on the off side
pitches on a good length on off stump and beats the bat
cracked off the back foot but doesn't beat the fielder at cover
pitches on middle and leg and moves across Yardy who defends it on the off side
on the pads this time and Yardy works it down to fine leg for one
full outside off stump. Mahmood attempts to drive but doesn't get a proper stride in and misses
angling in from outside off stump, kisses the top of the pad on the way through to the keeper. Pakistan go up in appeal but Umpire Harper is unmoved
wide outside off stump. Mahmood tries to pull the ball but was way off the mark
left alone outside off stump.
dabbed on the off side for a sharp single
inside edge on to the pad. Pakistan appeal in vain.
drifting onto middle and leg. Mahmood works it through midwicket and times it well enough to reach the fence and fetch England four vital runs
another four down leg side. Dreadful ball down legside and Mahmood tickles it down to fine leg for four
half-volley outside off stump. Mahmood leans into it and unleashes a fierce cover drive for four.
angling into Yardy from round the wicket. Defended on the off side
sprayed down leg side. Wide called, England need five more
left alone outside off stump. Yardy is playing a superbly composed innings
full on of stump. Driven on the up through covers for three
drifting on to the pads and it hits the pad for a leg bye down to fine leg
defended on the off side
full on off stump and Yardy pushes it past Asif for the winning runs
